credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Partnership for Change
description: Top two-thirds of poster is a grid of colored squares in yellow, orange, dark orange, red, magenta, purple, blue, teal and green (from left to right, top to bottom). Within each square is a black hand embracing a hand the same color as the square. Bottom third of poster is white, with a logo of two houses in the bottom left corner and text in black along the bottom which reads: "partnership for change new york model cities"
name: Poster
